thread.title: Imperial Capital Expands its Security Practice Group

author: cnbc.com
title: Imperial Capital Expands its Security Practice Group

organizations.name: imperial capital expands its security practice group
security practice group of its investment banking

text:
LOS ANGELES, April 10, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Imperial Capital, LLC , announced today that William (“Bill”) Lynch has joined the firm as Managing Director in the Security Practice Group of its Investment Banking division. Mr. Lynch will be based out of the firm’s Los Angeles office.
Mr. Lynch has over 18 years of Investment Banking experience, with focus on mergers & acquisitions and strategic advisory. He joins the firm from ProFinance Associates, Inc., where he spent his tenure working security, maritime technology, and high gross margin and repetitive income service businesses. In security and life-safety, he has managed and completed transactions in software, hardware, sensors, recurring revenue monitoring, and integration service businesses. Prior to ProFinance, Bill was in industrial manufacturing, where he led strategic and capital planning, distribution, marketing, and sales with responsibility for the general management of the western United States for the Industrial Gypsum Division of USG Corporation. Mr. Lynch has a B.S. in Business Administration from Menlo College.
“I am honored to join the Security team at Imperial Capital, where I hope to continue to build upon the group’s long-standing industry success,” said Mr. Lynch.
“Imperial Capital’s Security practice is a well-established, thriving focus of the firm, and Bill’s experience, longstanding and trusted relationships and superior execution advice will be a significant addition to the group,” said John E. Mack III, Co-Head of Investment Banking, Head of Security Practice Group and Head of M&A.
About Imperial Capital, LLC
Imperial Capital, founded in 1997, is a full-service investment banking firm with offices in Los Angeles, New York, San Francisco, Minneapolis, Boston and Houston. The firm currently employs over 170 professionals and offers a wide range of proprietary products and services to institutional investors, middle market companies, and private equity firms. Imperial Capital provides institutional clients research and sales and trading of high yield and distressed debt securities, bank debt, convertible bonds, preferred stocks, and equities. The firm provides middle market companies and financial sponsors with capital markets, merger and acquisitions, capital structure, restructuring and recapitalization advisory services. More information about Imperial Capital can be found at www.imperialcapital.com .
